title: Party of Five
description: A magical bunny, daft pirates, a village of rastafari elves, two princesses, a semi-retired thief and an aspiring bard, plus flying ships, dimensional portals and a largely silly sorcerer with a dangerous, mysterious amulet.How do they all fit together, you may ask? Fate, it seems. Or maybe not.Add a dash of fire, a pinch of lightning and some magic to your life.And remember, it could all be just a bad trip..This is the first book, Book I, in the "Party of Five" series of fantasy novellas.
author: Vasileios Kalampakas
